archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1460
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a PO, I want to be able to integrate with third parties to enable offers

properties.value: [CLM] CLM enable OOTB possibility to manage loyalty program partners, depending on configuration and requirements partners can use ear and/or burn features. It is possible to integrate with partners who deliver rewards/offers, details to be agreed during analysis what type of third parties?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
